name: Spidermask
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS DISTURBING

A horror stealth game where you can control NPCs. Controls(you should figure it out in tutorial, also there is a reference at the bottom of the game screen):
Spider controls:
WASD-move
Q-makes a spider web, NPCs can't pass through it
E-screams, NPCs come towards you
Left mouse button, shoots poison towards mouse position if you hit an NPC, it starts shooting other NPCs
When you jump on NPC's head, you start to control it
NPC controls:
AD-move
W-jump out of NPC, he dies
E-shout, NPCs come towards you

If you still don't understand something, you can watch the playthrough:
